question: A man rows a boat 18 kilometers in 4 hours downstream and returns upstream in 12 hours. The speed of the (in km/hr) stream is :
explanation:
Rate downstream = $latex \\frac{18}{4}=\\frac{9}{2} km/hr&s=1$
Rate upstream = $latex \\frac{18}{12}=\\frac{3}{2} km/hr&s=1$
Now, speed of the stream = $latex \\frac{Rate Downstream - Rate Upstream }{2}&s=1$
$latex =>\\frac{\\frac{9}{2}-\\frac{3}{2}}{2}=\\frac{6}{4}=\\frac{3}{2}&s=2$
$latex =>1.5 km/hr$
Hence option [B] is the right answer.
